entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. Wind light except northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 near Bowen Island in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:29 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind light except northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 near Bowen Island in the evening. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:29 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
